name: Polynomial.aeval_algebraMap_apply
initialProofState:

x : A
p : Polynomial R
⊢ Eq ((Polynomial.aeval ((algebraMap A B) x)) p) ((algebraMap A B) ((Polynomial.aeval x) p))

theorem aeval_algebraMap_apply (x : A) (p : R[X]) :

⊢ Iff (Eq ((Polynomial.aeval ((algebraMap A B) x)) p) 0) (Eq ((Polynomial.aeval x) p) 0)

theorem aeval_algebraMap_eq_zero_iff [NoZeroSMulDivisors A B] [Nontrivial B] (x : A) (p : R[X]) :

name: Subalgebra.aeval_coe
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
S : Subalgebra R A
x : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem S x
p : Polynomial R
⊢ Eq ((Polynomial.aeval ↑x) p) ↑((Polynomial.aeval x) p)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem aeval_coe (S : Subalgebra R A) (x : S) (p : R[X]) : aeval (x : A) p = aeval x p :=
  aeval_algebraMap_apply A x p
